class.name: StandardMaterial3D
class.brief_description: A PBR (Physically Based Rendering) material to be used on 3D objects.
class.description: [StandardMaterial3D]'s properties are inherited from [BaseMaterial3D]. [StandardMaterial3D] uses separate textures for ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic maps. To use a single ORM map for all 3 textures, use an [ORMMaterial3D] instead.
